Module com.example.proyecto3_
Package com.example.proyecto3_.model.Game

Class GameConfig

java.lang.Object
com.example.proyecto3_.model.Game.GameConfig
public class GameConfig extends Object
Singleton class to store game configuration and handle all game logic. Provides thread-safe operations for managing game state and player actions.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameConfig

      private GameConfig()
      Creates a new GameConfig instance with default values. Private constructor to enforce singleton pattern.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static GameConfig getInstance()
      Gets the singleton instance of GameConfig.
      Returns:
      the unique GameConfig instance

    • setNumBots

      public void setNumBots(int numBots)
      Sets the number of bots for the game.
      Parameters:
      numBots - number of machine players (1-3)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if numBots is not between 1 and 3

    • getNumBots

      public int getNumBots()
      Gets the number of bots configured.
      Returns:
      number of machine players

    • initializeGame

      public void initializeGame()
      Initializes a new game with the configured number of bots. Thread-safe operation that creates and starts a new game.

    • resetTurnFlags

      private void resetTurnFlags()
      Resets turn flags for human player. Called at the start of each turn.

    • playCard

      public boolean playCard(Card card)
      Attempts to play a card for the current player. Thread-safe operation with validation checks.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to play
      Returns:
      true if card was played successfully, false otherwise

    • drawCard

      public boolean drawCard()
      Attempts to draw a card for the current player. Thread-safe operation that handles deck recycling if needed.
      Returns:
      true if card was drawn successfully, false otherwise

    • checkAndRecycleDeck

      private void checkAndRecycleDeck()
      Checks if deck is empty and recycles automatically. Called before drawing cards to ensure deck availability.

    • completeTurn

      public void completeTurn()
      Completes the current turn and moves to next player. Thread-safe operation that resets flags and advances turn.

    • processMachineTurnAsync

      public Future<GameConfig.MachineTurnResult> processMachineTurnAsync()
      Processes machine player's turn asynchronously. Executes card selection, playing, and drawing in a separate thread.
      Returns:
      Future with MachineTurnResult containing the outcome

    • processMachineTurn

      public GameConfig.MachineTurnResult processMachineTurn()
      Processes machine player's turn synchronously. Executes card selection, playing, and drawing in current thread.
      Returns:
      MachineTurnResult with the outcome

    • validateMoveAsync

      public Future<Boolean> validateMoveAsync(Card card)
      Validates if a move is valid asynchronously. Useful for AI planning and move validation without blocking.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to validate
      Returns:
      Future containing true if move is valid, false otherwise

    • eliminateCurrentPlayer

      public String eliminateCurrentPlayer()
      Eliminates the current player. Thread-safe operation that removes player and returns cards to deck.
      Returns:
      name of eliminated player

    • canCurrentPlayerPlay

      public boolean canCurrentPlayerPlay()
      Checks if current player can make any valid move. Thread-safe operation.
      Returns:
      true if player can play, false otherwise

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      Checks if the game has ended. Thread-safe operation.
      Returns:
      true if game is over, false otherwise

    • getWinner

      public Player getWinner()
      Gets the winner of the game. Thread-safe operation.
      Returns:
      the winning player, or null if game is not over

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown()
      Shuts down all thread pools gracefully. Waits for threads to terminate before forcing shutdown.

    • getGame

      public GameModel getGame()
      Gets the current game model. Thread-safe operation.
      Returns:
      the game model

    • hasHumanPlayedCard

      public boolean hasHumanPlayedCard()
      Checks if human player has played a card this turn.
      Returns:
      true if card was played, false otherwise

    • hasHumanDrawnCard

      public boolean hasHumanDrawnCard()
      Checks if human player has drawn a card this turn.
      Returns:
      true if card was drawn, false otherwise

    • isHumanTurnComplete

      public boolean isHumanTurnComplete()
      Checks if human player has completed their turn.
      Returns:
      true if both played and drawn, false otherwise
